topics.body:
So apparently I recently found the lost ark of tv show making and video game making where people actually give a fuck about what they're making instead of hitting any person that gives it a negative review with a brick. . And by god is my fucking free time going right the fuck out of the window and apparently they go by the name "atlus games" and by god I would suck their big fat rooster for actually giving a care about their products.

I was browsing through my old ps2 games and since I no longer have a ps2(it broke) I was looking through my old discs and anyways back to the topic.  I found a old copy of persona and was wondering what other games they made and holy shit I hit the jackpot; not only do they make persona they make super robot taisen, odin sphere, wait they made skygunner?  Give me a second I'm going to have to get a mop to clean up a bit.

Atlus didn't make Super robot Wars, You dumbo, They only did the localization of the Original Generation games, Which are shit (The localizations, Not the games) Banpresto made the games, Also Go Play the Mainstream ones sometime, (Like Alpha gaiden or J) Crossover games at their finest

topics.body:
"@gasmaskangel":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/531fd53b63687270ce0a0100#post_531fd53b63687270ce0a0100
The reason why I like persona is that they actually have a reasonable reason why no one is seeing this shit and no one is the wiser about how there's monsters mucking about.

Most other franchises go, "Eh what monster are you talking about running about in the middle of the city?  All I see is this nice person trying to give me a hug with a chainsaw"
"@gasmaskangel":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/531fd53b63687270ce0a0100#post_531fd53b63687270ce0a0100

topics.body:
That moment when you know you're expected to write a thing and draw some other things. But you feel to down to do it. I keep figuring if I can do one thing I'll feel better and can move onto the others, but I don't know how to start the one.

I'd like to start the writing bit, because I know I can put out something to move it along to drop it for a little bit. But I don't know how to carry it. Writing for an RP so it's something I don't need to fuss over until some other ass hole posts and gives me an IC opening.
topics.author: 4fe4bf947f123b175b000001

topics.body:
Playing New Vegas as a sneaky assassin!

As per the lore my Asian character specializes in covert takedowns.
Sadly he cannot be truly one ethnicity as I am forced to use Chinese weapons while all the perks are Japanese (Ninja, kamikaze etc).

So I make do.

Next will be the Hispanic Legion Terrorist character specializing in explosives.

Then the suave Mr House agent who talks his way out of things.

Then the Laser Happy Yes Man Insurgent. Who will be white... And my favorite. 
But not for that reason. Well partly. You see, I am white so I can more easily project onto a white charac- you know what?! I don't gotta explain nothin!
